scripts.build:release-targets: npx npm-run-all clean:release --serial build:user build:pro build:extras
scripts.build:all: npx npm-run-all clean:release --serial build:user build:pro build:extras build:dev
scripts.build:dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_TARGET=dev npm run _build-target
scripts._build-target: npx npm-run-all clean:out --serial _vite-build _electron-builder-dist && npx npm-run-all --parallel clean:artifacts clean:out
scripts.clean:artifacts: npx rimraf release/win-unpacked release/builder-debug.yml release/builder-effective-config.yaml && node build/clean-artifacts.js
